# The Unshakeable Warrior
## Scripture
"Let us also lay aside every weight, and sin which clings so closely, and let us run with endurance the race that is set before us," â€“ Hebrews 12:1

## Reflection
As warriors of Christ, we are called to run a specific race, not just any race. The world around us is full of distractions, temptations, and weights that slow us down. But as followers of Jesus, we have the strength and power to overcome these obstacles. We must make a conscious decision to lay aside the things that hinder us and focus on our spiritual journey. This involves surrendering to God, letting go of sinful desires, and running with endurance in our pursuit of Him. As we do this, we will experience the transforming power of the Holy Spirit, and we will become the men God has called us to be.

## Daily Challenge
"Run 10 laps around the block while praying for the strength to overcome your spiritual battles."
